channel.title: Homes on Tanay Kumar Saha
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Tanay Kumar Saha

item.description: Biography I have defended my PhD thesis and graduating in May, 2018 from Purdue University, West Lafayette. My research interest includes developing novel data mining and machine learning algorithms for applications in various domains, such as text mining, biology, and security. I have open-sourced the codes related to my PhD thesis. [Sen2Vec Code,Temporal node2vec Code, Motif Finding Code, Frequent Subgraph Mining Code, Finding Functional Motif Code]. During my PhD, I had the opportunity to work with many industrial research labs including eBay, CareerBuilder, NEC Labs, Data Analytics Team at QCRI, and iControl ESI.
